title: 'It won't change the world' - F1 drivers on flexi-wing clampdown
summary: The impact of the Spanish GP technical directive remains a big mystery for all

qa_pairs.question: What was the main purpose of the technical directive introduced at the Spanish Grand Prix?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: To limit the use of flexible wings in Formula 1.
wrong_options: To implement a new fuel type

qa_pairs.question: How do flexible wings affect the performance of a Formula 1 car?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: They can provide additional downforce by bending at high speeds.
